packages.name: MavensMate
packages.description: MavensMate for Sublime Text is a plugin that aims to replicate the functionality of the Eclipse-based Force.com IDE.
packages.author: joeferraro

osx.release_notes: Resolves issue where MavensMate could not find MavensMate.app for OSX Users. Resolves indexing apex symbols on project upgrade/create issue. Major update. OSX Users: be sure you are running the latest MavensMate.app and plugin. http://mavensmate.com/Getting_Started/Release_Notes
